name: Broken (Samuel Collier)
description:
This is a three level platformer where you play as a mechanic, trying to find the way home to your son.

This game consists of three uniquely-crafted and designed levels, with each level getting progressively harder and more complex.

In this game, you'll find:

  • A unique factory-esq game environment
  • Death by (moving) saws and acid
  • Traps and falling/sliding blocks
  • A final resolution cutscene
  • Engaging gameplay music
  • And more!

Notes:

  • Executable available for Linux and Windows.
    • The Windows version is not tested (I don't have a Windows computer), so it could be very buggy.
  • This game is not mobile friendly. Please play on PC with a standard-sized display.
  • Movement Options: WASD or Arrow Keys
